  • Arguments
  • View page source

Arguments¶

workspace_folder: str¶

Path (either relative to the code execution folder or absolute) containing the ATLAS histfactory workspace (containing the “Regions” subfolders). It is saved in the Histfactory.workspace_folder attribute.

  • type: str or None

  • default: None

name¶

Name of the Histfactory object. It is used to build the Histfactory.name attribute.

  • type: str or None

  • default: None

regions_folders_base_name¶

Common folder name of the “Region” folders contained in the workspace_folder (these folders are usually named “RegionA”, “RegionB”, etc.). It is used to set the Histfactory.regions_folders_base_name attribute.

  • type: str

  • default: Region

bkg_files_base_name¶

Name (with or without the .json extension) of the “background” json files in the “Region” folders (e.g. “BkgOnly”). It is used to set the Histfactory.bkg_files_base_name attribute.

  • type: str

  • default: BkgOnly

patch_files_base_name¶

Base name (without the .json extension) of the “signal” patch json files in the “Region” folders (e.g. “patch”). It is used to set the Histfactory.patch_files_base_name attribute.

  • type: str

  • default: patch

output_folder¶

Path (either relative to the code execution folder or absolute) where output files are saved. It is used to set the Lik.output_folder attribute.

  • type: str or None

  • default: None

input_file¶

File name (either relative to the code execution folder or absolute, with or without extension) of a saved Histfactory object. It is used to set the Histfactory.input_file attribute.

  • type: str or None

  • default: None

verbose¶

Argument used to set the verbosity mode of the Histfactory.__init__ method and the default verbosity mode of all class methods that accept a verbose argument. See Verbosity mode.

  • type: bool or int

  • default: True
